name: Siege MOBA Cross-Language Test Fixtures
description: Test fixtures for verifying game logic implementations across TypeScript, Rust, Go, and other languages

fixtures.description: Damage reduction, armor penetration, physical/magic/true damage
Stat at level, attack speed, final stat calculations
XP thresholds, level calculation, experience sharing
Ability haste to CDR conversion, actual cooldown
Kill gold, bounties, assists, passive gold
Movement speed, slows, position updates, attack cooldown
Ability damage/value calculations with stat scaling
Fog of war, visibility, bush mechanics

usage.typescript: import fixtures from './damage_calculations.json'; // Uses TypeScript JSON imports

tolerance_notes.integer_values: Use tolerance of 0 for integer-only results (levels, XP thresholds)
